all_text_timv: La Rue, Pierre de, -1518. Missa pro defunctis. Latin Requiem [sound recording] / Pierre de la Rue. 5 motets / Giaches de Wert. Klampenborg, Denmark : Kontrapunkt, [1988] [Place of publication not identified] : Distributed by Koch Import Service. ℗1988 1 audio disc : digital ; 4 3/4 in. performed music prm rdacontent audio s rdamedia audio disc sd rdacarrier Distributor from label on container. Program notes and English translation of Latin words of the 2nd-6th works (4 p.) included. Compact disc. Eds. recorded: Wolfenbüttel : Möseler Verlag, 1931 (1st work); London : Mapa Mundi, 1982 (2nd-6th works). Requiem / Pierre de la Rue (29:52) -- Adesto dolori meo, O Deus (4:00) ; Ascendente Iesu in naviculam (5:15) ; Amen, amen dico vobis (5:42) ; Egressus Iesus (5:53) ; Vox in Rama (4:09) / Giaches de Wert. Ars Nova (vocal group) ; Bo Holten, conductor. Recorded Nov. 27-29, 1985 and Feb. 9-10, 1986, at Ny Carlsberg glyptotek, Copenhagen. Motets. Choruses, Sacred (Mixed voices, 5 parts), Unaccompanied. Requiems, Unaccompanied. Wert, Giaches de, 1535-1596. Motets. Selections. Holten, Bo, conductor. Ars Nova (Vocal group), performer.
